sourcesContent:
<template lang="">
  <button @click="login" v-if="!userIsAuthenticated">Login</button>
  <button @click="logout" v-if="userIsAuthenticated">Logout</button>
</template>
<script>
  import { mapActions, mapGetters } from "vuex";

  export default {
    methods: {
      ...mapActions({
        login: "login",
        logout: "logout",
      }),
    },
    computed: {
      ...mapGetters(["userIsAuthenticated"]),
    },
  };
</script>
<style lang=""></style>
